changes.description:
Replaced Flask with Quart as the primary framework powering the back-end. This includes:
	- Replaced Flask-CORS with Quart-cors to handle cross-origin resource sharing.
	- All endpoints, as well as the `requires_auth` decorator, now use the async/await pattern.
Added pytest-asyncio and updated all tests to use the async/await pattern as well (since the test client's HTTP-based methods and the request's data both return a coroutine).
